title: Bib 3mm Casette Tape Editing and Joining Kit
brief_description:
Bib 3mm Casette Tape Editing and Joining Kit in Yellow and clear plastic wallet
Contains
-Bib Recording Tape Splicer (Made in England)
-Index Cards for Cassette container labels
-Self adhesive stickers for casettes (with handwriting “POP SONGS AND / COMMUNITY SINGING”)
-Razor blade
